languages.text: "Не противься, о сладкоголосая сестра! Разве сказал писарь хоть слово против правды?"
"Do not protest, sweet-voiced sister! Has the scribe said a word of untruth?"
languages.original_text: "Не противься, о сладкоголосая сестра! Разве сказал писарь хоть слово против правды?"

traits.locale_text: "Don't protest, sweet-voiced sister! Has the scribe said a word of untruth?"
"Don't protest, sweet-voiced sister! Has the scribe said a word of untruth?"
"Don't protest, sweet-voiced sister! Has the scribe said a word of untruth?"
"Don't protest, sweet-voiced sister! Has the scribe said a word of untruth?"
"Do not protest, sweet-voiced sister! Has the scribe said a word of untruth?"
"Do not protest, sweet-voiced sister! Has the scribe said a word of untruth?"

languages.text: «¡No proteste, hermana de dulce voz! ¿Acaso ha proclamado el escriba una sola falsedad?».
languages.original_text: "Do not protest, sweet-voiced sister! Has the scribe said a word of untruth?"

traits.locale_text: «¡No proteste, hermana de dulce voz! ¿Acaso ha proclamado el escriba una sola falsedad?».

languages.text: “先别急着反对，声音甜美的修女！这位缮写员有哪句话说错了吗？”
languages.original_text: "Do not protest, sweet-voiced sister! Has the scribe said a word of untruth?"

traits.locale_text: “先别急着反对，声音甜美的修女！这位缮写员有哪句话说错了吗？”

languages.text: 「甘い声のシスターさん、言い返さないで！書記官が何か間違ったことでも言ったかしら？」
languages.original_text: "Do not protest, sweet-voiced sister! Has the scribe said a word of untruth?"

traits.locale_text: 「甘い声のシスターさん、言い返さないで！書記官が何か間違ったことでも言ったかしら？」

languages.text: « Inutile de prendre la mouche, ma sœur à la voix de miel ! Le scribe a-t-il proféré le moindre mensonge à votre sujet ? »
languages.original_text: "Do not protest, sweet-voiced sister! Has the scribe said a word of untruth?"

traits.locale_text: « Inutile de prendre la mouche, ma sœur à la voix de miel ! Le scribe a-t-il proféré le moindre mensonge à votre sujet ? »

languages.text: "İtiraz etme tatlı dilli rahibem! Kâtip, gerçek dışı tek bir kelime etti mi?"
languages.original_text: "Do not protest, sweet-voiced sister! Has the scribe said a word of untruth?"

traits.locale_text: "İtiraz etme tatlı dilli rahibem! Kâtip, gerçek dışı tek bir kelime etti mi?"

languages.text: "Protestiert nicht, Schwester mit der süßen Stimme! Hat der Schreiber die Unwahrheit gesagt?"
languages.original_text: "Do not protest, sweet-voiced sister! Has the scribe said a word of untruth?"

traits.locale_text: "Protestiert nicht, Schwester mit der süßen Stimme! Hat der Schreiber die Unwahrheit gesagt?"
